channel.title: I Support Signature's

item.title: I Support Signature's
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

[quote=“amy_webb, post:5, topic:518279”][quote author=3lv3n snip3r link=topic=636542.msg4291685#msg4291685 date=1367400874]

Change the text colour to white for the light style, it is hard to see. Looks simple, it doesn’t really catch your eye.

Correct me if I’m wrong, but do you mean the dark style?
[/quote]
The bottom one where the text is black and the box is black, the way it is listed suggests it was the light style.[/quote]
Ah, I understand.

Read full topic
